data.title: American Lung Association
data.meta_description: The American Lung Association is the leading organization working to save lives by improving lung health and preventing lung disease, through research, education and advocacy.
data.text:
Our Vision Is a World Free of Lung Disease

And we won't stop until we get there. Join us as we work to save lives by improving lung health, preventing lung disease, and creating a healthy world for all.

Research Call for Applications

Our 2024-2025 Awards and Grants applications are now open! Researchers in lung health are encouraged to apply to any of our nine current funding opportunities, including our new Indoor Air Award.

Help Us Create a World Free of Lung Disease

We are powered by everyday heroes and volunteers. Your support fuels our mission. Participate in an event, volunteer, become an advocate, or donate. Make a difference today.

Stand with LUNG FORCE to Defeat Lung Cancer

Only a force of many can take on lung cancer—the #1 cancer killer in America. LUNG FORCE unites us to stand together and save lives.

Join the Patient & Caregiver Network

Your community is here to support you. Whether you’re a patient living with a chronic lung disease or a caregiver, join this network to get direct access to timely education, support, and connection.

You Stopped Smoking—Now Start Screening

If you smoked, low-dose CT screening could save your life. Take the Saved By The Scan quiz to see if you should get screened for lung cancer.

Find Your Community

The impact of lung disease can be devastating—and no one should have to face it alone. Find an in-person support group, connect with an expert online or over the phone, or join one of our online communities today.
